content: special offer buy 3 patterns for price of 2 everything s blooming outside so i wanted to crochet some flowers slightly_smiling_face mandala coaster approx 12 cm in diameter with scheepjes catona yarn pattern pdf has 7 pages watch step by step video of crocheting this mandala coaster https //youtube com/shorts/lz4gkarb8f0 feature=share i have short version of this pattern without chart schema for free on my blog https //lelijo lt/mandala-tulips-free-crochet-pattern/
